author: Special Correspondent
text:
Five country made hand grenades were recovered from a gymnasium here on Tuesday at a spot that witnessed a murderous attack on a Moovendar Munnetra Kazhagam leader last week.

Police said that R. Vairamuthu (31) of Kotha Theru here was attacked with aruval by a gang as he emerged from the gymnasium on the Kamalalayam South Bank after his routine exercises on March 9.

While Vairamuthu is recovering in a private hospital in Thanjavur, police have registered a case and are on the look out for Ravi, Marimuthu, and some others involved in the crime.

The gymnasium that remained shut since that attack was reopened on Tuesday when the visitors noticed the five country made hand grenades kept sheathed by waste cloth just near the spot where the attack took place.

The rushed to the spot, recovered the explosives, and are inquiring into the incident.
title: Five grenades recovered
